entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:38 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 04:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -29.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -32.0°C
Wind: SW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
